MooMod:MooMod.NAME: MooMod
MooMod:MooMod.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Autoplay. NL Shuffle a random Curse into your draw pile. NL Purge. Soulbound.

MooMod:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
MooMod:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, NL then draw that many cards. NL Purge.

MooMod:PowerSwap.NAME: PowerSwap
MooMod:PowerSwap.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Focus. NL Lose 2 Strength. NL Lose 2 Dexterity.

MooMod:NaturalOne.NAME: Natural One
MooMod:NaturalOne.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. NL Soulbound.

MooMod:Greed.NAME: Greed
MooMod:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of this card to your deck. Gain !M! extra gold at the end of combat for each Greed in your deck. Ethereal.

MooMod:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
MooMod:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Place a copy of this copy into your discard pile.

MooMod:EnhanceAbility.NAME: Enhance Ability
MooMod:EnhanceAbility.DESCRIPTION: Gain either !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity, !M! Focus, or !M!0  Temporary HP.

MooMod:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
MooMod:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Lose all max energy. Gain 1 max energy at the end of each turn.

MooMod:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
MooMod:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.

MooMod:Ssssneak.NAME: Ssssneak
MooMod:Ssssneak.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Draw additional cards equal to this card's cost. NL Snecko.
MooMod:Ssssneak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw additional cards equal to double this card's cost. NL Snecko.

MooMod:SpecializedCircuitry.NAME: Specialized Circuitry
MooMod:SpecializedCircuitry.DESCRIPTION: Choose a type of orb. NL Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.
MooMod:SpecializedCircuitry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a type of orb. NL Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.

MooMod:Counter.NAME: Counter
MooMod:Counter.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to its intended damage.

MooMod:ReadiedAction.NAME: Readied Action
MooMod:ReadiedAction.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! card.
MooMod:ReadiedAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

MooMod:CleavingFinish.NAME: Cleaving Finish
MooMod:CleavingFinish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, this card stays in your hand and costs 0 for the turn.

MooMod:Ukulele.NAME: Ukulele
MooMod:Ukulele.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Lightning you currently have Channeled.

MooMod:Prefetch.NAME: Prefetch
MooMod:Prefetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It is Innate for the next combat. NL Exhaust.

MooMod:Lust.NAME: Lust
MooMod:Lust.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Choose a random enemy. This turn, anytime you attack that enemy, lose !M! HP.

MooMod:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
MooMod:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, all cards Exhaust.

MooMod:Envy.NAME: Envy
MooMod:Envy.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL A random card in your hand becomes Unplayable for the turn.

MooMod:SpiceAddiction.NAME: SPICE
MooMod:SpiceAddiction.DESCRIPTION: Obtain the Spice relic instead of this card.

MooMod:Compulsion.NAME: Compulsion
MooMod:Compulsion.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, chooses a random card in your hand. You must play that card before any other.

MooMod:DoWhile.NAME: Do While
MooMod:DoWhile.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card is repeated at NL +1 [E] until you run out of [E].

MooMod:TrickCloak.NAME: Trick Cloak
MooMod:TrickCloak.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a random card from your discard pile. NL Draw !M! card.
MooMod:TrickCloak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your discard pile. NL Draw !M! card.
